Structs/KeychainSwiftConstants.html#/s:6.abstract: A value that indicates when your app needs access to the data in a keychain item. The default value is AccessibleWhenUnlocked. For a list of possible values, see KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.

Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.name: accessibleWhenUnlocked
Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.abstract: The data in the keychain item can be accessed only while the device is unlocked by the user.

Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.name: accessibleWhenUnlockedThisDeviceOnly
Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.abstract: The data in the keychain item can be accessed only while the device is unlocked by the user.

Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.name: accessibleAfterFirstUnlock
Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.abstract: The data in the keychain item cannot be accessed after a restart until the device has been unlocked once by the user.

Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.name: accessibleAfterFirstUnlockThisDeviceOnly
Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.abstract: The data in the keychain item cannot be accessed after a restart until the device has been unlocked once by the user.

Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.name: accessibleAlways
Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.abstract: The data in the keychain item can always be accessed regardless of whether the device is locked.

Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.name: accessibleWhenPasscodeSetThisDeviceOnly
Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.abstract: The data in the keychain can only be accessed when the device is unlocked. Only available if a passcode is set on the device.

Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.name: accessibleAlwaysThisDeviceOnly
Enums/KeychainSwiftAccessOptions.html#/s.abstract: The data in the keychain item can always be accessed regardless of whether the device is locked.

Classes/KinClient.html.name: KinClient
Classes/KinClient.html.abstract: KinClient is a factory class for managing instances of KinAccount.

Classes/PaymentWatch.html.name: PaymentWatch
Classes/PaymentWatch.html.abstract: PaymentWatch watches for PaymentInfo changes of a given account and sends the new PaymentInfo value when one is available.

Classes/BalanceWatch.html.name: BalanceWatch
Classes/BalanceWatch.html.abstract: BalanceWatch watches for Kin balance changes of a given account and sends the new Kin value when one is available.

Classes/CreationWatch.html.name: CreationWatch
Classes/CreationWatch.html.abstract: CreationWatch notifies when we know that the status of an account is .created. An event is sent when an account has just been created on the blockchain network, or when we start watching an account that is already created.

Classes/EventWatcher.html.name: EventWatcher
Classes/EventWatcher.html.abstract: EventWatcher<EventType> is a generic class for Stellar event watcher classes.
